extendedInfo.description: PÃ­ldora anticonceptiva es una aplicaciÃ³n diseÃ±ada para las mujeres que tomen la pÃ­ldora y quieran llevar un completo control.Es configurable tanto para recordarte diariamente con una alarma de que tienes que tomarte la pÃ­ldora como avisarte de que tienes que ir a comprar la siguiente caja con algunos dÃ­as de antelaciÃ³n, e incluso puedes ver cuando te vendrÃ¡n las siguientes menstruaciones con un calendario cÃ³modo e intuitivo.Puedes ponerte en contacto con nosotros para trasmitirnos dudas o sugerencias, o ayudarnos en la traducciÃ³n a otros idiomas, en el siguiente e-mail:pill@jfma.estags: mujer , anticonceptivos , hijos , anticoncepciÃ³n , sexo , pareja ,

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I would just ask to have a pop-up, that would appear after clicking on the in the pill icon to mark if it was take, forgoten, etc... instead of blinking in blue. I saw this in another app and was great... but overall your app is better. .
reviews.author: Mandy Mais

reviews.title: App is great.....but,
reviews.comment: It\'s not ideal for Natazia users, and resets my data monthly. But great reminders, would be great if it somehow incorporated your menstrual and intimacy data.
reviews.author: Amee Carbajal

reviews.title: where\'s the cute widget gone bring it back!!
reviews.comment: Love the app. Looks a lot better since the update but where\'s the cute update gone??! Bring it back its amazing!
reviews.author: priya sivanesan

reviews.title: No longer working since the update!
reviews.comment: This was the best app in existence (including the one for Nuva Ring), but since the update the alarm doesn\'t go off or push out to notify me. This is  a major bug, wouldn\'t you say?  Because of it, I\'d give you less than one star if I could.
reviews.author: Lynn Morley

reviews.title: Uses to be good
reviews.comment: Lost the widget!
reviews.author: Alex Maki

reviews.title: The widget disappeared after the last update
reviews.comment: It is a good app but for some odd reason the widget disappeared after the last update.
reviews.author: Miglena Tsvetkova

reviews.title: Was great until the update
reviews.comment: It was amazing, worked perfectly, but after the update the alarm doesn\'t go off!!
reviews.author: Eilidh Gibb

reviews.title: No alarm
reviews.comment: Love the app but the alarm isn\'t going off at the set time.
reviews.author: Melanie Raglin

reviews.comment: Wonderful except for one thing. It is only configured for pill packs that don\'t have placebo pills.I have missed several pills because of this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: perfect
reviews.comment: I love this app. it does all i need and has saved my ass so many times. love the fact that i can easily change days if i go off my pill for a while and lets me plan ahead by showing me when i\'ll be due to go off my pill. without my pill i suffer more than normal due to a disorder so this is definetly a required app. have downloaded it to evey device i\'ve ever gotten for the last year or more. thank you.
reviews.author: Amy Grennan

reviews.comment: I like the calendar and being able to look ahead, but I would like a reminder for my blank pills too. Alarm doesn\'t ring during off days.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: worls as expected
reviews.author: Maria Shiela Rabanal

reviews.title: Awful!!
reviews.comment: The alarm never goes off!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just started
reviews.comment: I need something that will remind me to take my birth control I\'m crossing my fingers on this one
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not as discrete...
reviews.comment: Newest update changed the notification icon to a huge pill. I prefer the cuter icon they used before. Uninstalling to something not as blaringly obvious.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Totally wrong
reviews.comment: You are supposed to have 7 clear days free which is plus one day, that is how my doctor told me, everyone is different but based on my instructions and advice this is not for me. Otherwise would have been perfect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I started having problems
reviews.comment: Since two days ago i\'m having problems this app is not ringing any more. The reminder stop working and b4 was very useful please fix it!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Been using this for 6 months now, great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best bc app out there
reviews.comment: Reminds you each day to take the pill, silently or with sound alarm. Also provides a calendar so you can look ahead and see if you will be on your period when you\'re on vacation in a few months!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Brilliant, simple and easy to use
reviews.author: A Google User
